school_index.description: This file provides an ID mapping for the seven Academic Schools at the University of Huddersfield.

license.statement: To the extent possible under law, Computing and Library Services, University of Huddersfield, UK has waived all copyright, moral rights, database rights, and any other rights that might be asserted over the data contained within this file.
